description: Sum of mistyped version of binomial coefficients.
links: Roland Bacher, Counting Packings of Generic Subsets in Finite Groups, Electr. J. Combinatorics, 19 (2012), #P7. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 06 2013
formula: a(n) = Sum(n!*k!/(n-k)!, k=0..n).E.g.f.: exp(x)*F(x), with F(x) = sum(k>=0, k!*x^k). - _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 02 2004a(n) = n^2*a(n - 1) - n*(n - 1)*a(n - 2) + 1. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 15 2004
author: Len Smiley
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 29 2012
